Name: Bubbbles
About the game: Bubbbles is a casual VR puzzle game where you'll need to get to the core of a pile of bubb(b)les! Match the correct color / texture bubbles to remove all similar touching bubbles while more fly in from the sky to throw you off. Features: -Bubble Popping in VR -20 Different Levels -Powerups -Realistic Physics -Scaling Difficulty
Meta Title: Bubbbles: Dec 5, 2022, Ben Olding Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bubbbles? Check out the release date (Dec 5, 2022), developer insights from Ben Olding Games, and a complete game summary.
